perturbation.original_text: BOSCH hereby grants CLIENT the "Exclusive Distribution License Rights" sell and distribute the Products within the "Territory". BOSCH hereby grants CLIENT un-exclusive "Reserved Rights" to sell and distribute the "Product" within the "Territory".
perturbation.changed_text: BOSCH hereby grants CLIENT the "Exclusive Distribution License Rights" sell and distribute the Products within the "Territory". BOSCH hereby grants CLIENT non-exclusive "Secondary Rights" to sell and distribute the "Product" within the "Territory".
perturbation.explanation: The terms "Reserved Rights" and "Secondary Rights" are used interchangeably without clear definition. This creates confusion about the scope and limitations of CLIENT's rights to distribute the product, potentially leading to disputes over which rights apply in specific scenarios.

perturbation.original_text: Bosch hereby grants to Client the exclusive rights to sell and distribute the Product, subject to the Territory as set forth below, to certain select companies in the Automotive Industry, each of which shall be approved by Bosch in writing as requested by the Client on a case by case basis.
perturbation.changed_text: Bosch hereby grants to Client the exclusive rights to market and promote the Goods, subject to the Territory as set forth below, to certain select companies in the Automotive Industry, each of which shall be approved by Bosch in writing as requested by the Client on a case by case basis.
perturbation.explanation: The terms "Product" and "Goods" are used interchangeably without a clear definition. While the document defines 'Product', using 'Goods' introduces ambiguity as it is not defined. This could lead to disputes regarding whether the exclusivity applies to all potential offerings or only specifically defined products.

perturbation.original_text: Without limiting any other agreement contained in this Agreement, CLIENT agrees to defend, indemnify and hold harmless BOSCH and its parents, subsidiary and affiliated entities, successors, assigns and licensees, and their respective officers, agents, directors, owners, shareholders and employees, harmless from any and all claims, actions or proceedings of any kind and from any and all damages, liabilities, costs and expenses (including reasonable legal fees) relating to or arising out of any claim by a third Party.
perturbation.changed_text: Without limiting any other agreement contained in this Agreement, CLIENT agrees to defend, indemnify and hold harmless BOSCH and its parents, subsidiary and affiliated entities, successors, assigns and licensees, and their respective officers, agents, directors, owners, shareholders and employees, harmless from any and all claims, actions or proceedings of any kind and from any and all losses, liabilities, costs and expenditures (including reasonable legal fees) relating to or arising out of any claim by a third Person.
perturbation.explanation: The terms "expenses" and "expenditures" are used interchangeably. Also, "Party" and "Person" are used interchangeably without definition. This introduces confusion as 'expenses' and 'expenditures' might be interpreted differently in some contexts, particularly in accounting or financial terms, and 'Party' generally means participants in the Agreement whereas 'Person' is much broader.
